mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id as "userId", u.user_name as "userName", p.product_name as "productName", p.product_price as "productPrice", c.cart_cnt as "cartCnt", (p.product_price*c.cart_cnt) as "totalPrice" FROM cart c, users u, product p WHERE c.product_id = p.product_id AND c.user_id = u.user_id AND c.user_id = #{userId}
